an6.62:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena dandakappakam nama kosalanam nigamo tadavasari.
an6.62:1.3: Atha kho bhagava magga okkamma annatarasmim rukkhamule pannatte asane nisidi.
an6.62:1.4: Te ca bhikkhu dandakappakam pavisimsu avasatham pariyesitum.
an6.62:2.1: Atha kho ayasma anando sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim yena aciravati nadi tenupasankami gattani parisincitum.
an6.62:2.2: Aciravatiya nadiya gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasi gattani pubbapayamano.
an6.62:2.3: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an6.62:2.4: “kim nu kho, avuso ananda, sabbam cetaso samannaharitva nu kho devadatto bhagavata byakato:
an6.62:2.5: ‘apayiko devadatto nerayiko kappattho atekiccho’ti, udahu kenacideva pariyayenati?
an6.62:2.6: Evam kho panetam, avuso, bhagavata byakatan”ti.
an6.62:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.62:3.2: “idhaham, bhante, sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim yena aciravati nadi tenupasankamim gattani parisincitum.
an6.62:3.3: Aciravatiya nadiya gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasim gattani pubbapayamano.
an6.62:3.4: Atha kho, bhante, annataro bhikkhu yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam etadavoca:
an6.62:3.5: ‘kim nu kho, avuso ananda, sabbam cetaso samannaharitva nu kho devadatto bhagavata byakato—
an6.62:3.6: apayiko devadatto nerayiko kappattho atekicchoti, udahu kenacideva pariyayena’ti?
an6.62:3.7: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, tam bhikkhum etadavocam:
an6.62:4.1: “So va kho, ananda, bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero va pana balo abyatto.
an6.62:4.2: Kathanhi nama yam maya ekamsena byakatam tattha dvejjham apajjissati.
an6.62:4.3: Naham, ananda, annam ekapuggalampi samanupassami, yo evam maya sabbam cetaso samannaharitva byakato, yathayidam devadatto.
an6.62:4.4: Yavakivancaham, ananda, devadattassa valaggakotinittudanamattampi sukkadhammam addasam;
an6.62:4.7: Yato ca kho aham, ananda, devadattassa valaggakotinittudanamattampi sukkadhammam na addasam;
an6.62:5.1: Seyyathapi, ananda, guthakupo sadhikaporiso puro guthassa samatittiko.
an6.62:5.3: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakamo hitakamo yogakkhemakamo tamha guthakupa uddharitukamo.
an6.62:5.4: So tam guthakupam samantanuparigacchanto neva passeyya tassa purisassa valaggakotinittudanamattampi guthena amakkhitam, yattha tam gahetva uddhareyya.
an6.62:5.5: Evamevam kho aham, ananda, yato devadattassa valaggakotinittudanamattampi sukkadhammam na addasam;
an6.62:5.8: Sace tumhe, ananda, suneyyatha tathagatassa purisindriyananani vibhajissami”ti?
an6.62:6.2: yam bhagava purisindriyananani vibhajeyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an6.62:6.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.62:7.1: “Idhaham, ananda, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:7.2: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamana kusalapi dhamma akusalapi dhamma’ti.
an6.62:7.3: Tamenam aparena samayena evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:7.4: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusala dhamma antarahita, akusala dhamma sammukhibhuta.
an6.62:7.5: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamulam asamucchinnam, tamha tassa kusala kusalam patubhavissati.
an6.62:7.7: Seyyathapi, ananda, bijani akhandani aputini avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani sukhette suparikammakataya bhumiya nikkhittani.
an6.62:7.8: Janeyyasi tvam, ananda, imani bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissanti”ti?
an6.62:7.10: “Evamevam kho aham, ananda, idhekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:7.11: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamana kusalapi dhamma akusalapi dhamma’ti.
an6.62:7.12: Tamenam aparena samayena evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:

an6.62:7.18: Evampi kho, ananda, tathagatassa ayatim dhammasamuppado cetasa ceto paricca vidito hoti.

an6.62:10.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.62:10.2: “sakka nu kho, bhante, imesam tinnam puggalanam aparepi tayo puggala sappatibhaga pannapetun”ti?
an6.62:10.4: “idhaham, ananda, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:10.5: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamana kusalapi dhamma akusalapi dhamma’ti.
an6.62:10.6: Tamenam aparena samayena evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:10.7: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusala dhamma antarahita, akusala dhamma sammukhibhuta.
an6.62:10.8: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamulam asamucchinnam, tampi sabbena sabbam samugghatam gacchati.
an6.62:10.10: Seyyathapi, ananda, angarani adittani sampajjalitani sajotibhutani puthusilaya nikkhittani.
an6.62:10.11: Janeyyasi tvam, ananda, nayimani angarani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissanti”ti?
an6.62:10.13: “Seyyathapi va pana, ananda, sayanhasamayam suriye ogacchante, janeyyasi tvam, ananda, aloko antaradhayissati andhakaro patubhavissati”ti?
an6.62:10.15: “Seyyathapi va, panananda, abhido addharattam bhattakalasamaye, janeyyasi tvam, ananda, aloko antarahito andhakaro patubhuto”ti?

an6.62:12.1: Idha panaham, ananda, ekaccam puggalam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
an6.62:12.2: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamana kusalapi dhamma akusalapi dhamma’ti.

an6.62:12.4: ‘natthi imassa puggalassa valaggakotinittudanamattopi akusalo dhammo, samannagatoyam puggalo ekantasukkehi anavajjehi dhammehi, dittheva dhamme parinibbayissati’ti.

an6.62:13.1: Tatrananda, ye te purima tayo puggala tesam tinnam puggalanam eko aparihanadhammo, eko parihanadhammo, eko apayiko nerayiko.
an6.62:13.2: Tatrananda, yeme pacchima tayo puggala imesam tinnam puggalanam eko parihanadhammo, eko aparihanadhammo, eko parinibbanadhammo”ti.
